statements: SELECT * FROM financial_aid;
SELECT financial_aid_id, student_id, amount FROM financial_aid ORDER BY received_date DESC;
SELECT scholarship_name, award_amount FROM scholarship_details WHERE application_deadline > NOW();
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT financial_aid_id, student_id, aid_type, amount FROM financial_aid WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_aid WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY received_date DESC;
SELECT scholarship_name, award_amount FROM scholarship_details WHERE application_deadline > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT student_name, email, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT financial_aid_id, student_id, aid_type, amount FROM financial_aid WHERE received_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT student_name FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM financial_aid;
SELECT student_id, amount FROM financial_aid WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT scholarship_name, amount, deadline FROM scholarships WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_aid ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT scholarship_name, eligibility_criteria FROM scholarships ORDER BY scholarship_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_aid WHERE approval_status = TRUE ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM scholarships WHERE deadline >= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT student_id, amount FROM financial_aid WHERE amount > 5000 AND approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT scholarship_name, eligibility_criteria FROM scholarships WHERE deadline < '2023-06-30' ORDER BY scholarship_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_aid WHERE amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_aid
SELECT student_id, amount FROM financial_aid ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM scholarship_details WHERE amount > 5000
SELECT student_id, total_funding FROM student_funding WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT aid_id, date_issued FROM financial_aid WHERE date_issued BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM financial_aid WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY date_issued DESC
SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM scholarship_details WHERE amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT student_id, total_funding, funding_type FROM student_funding WHERE status='Active' ORDER BY total_funding DESC
SELECT financial_aid.aid_id, student_id, amount, date_issued, scholarship_name FROM financial_aid JOIN scholarship_details ON financial_aid.amount=scholarship_details.amount
SELECT * FROM student_funding WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM financial_aid WHERE amount > 3000) ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Scholarship;
SELECT * FROM FinancialAid WHERE status='Approved';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Student WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT source_name, amount_available FROM FundingSource ORDER BY amount_available DESC;
SELECT student_id, amount FROM FinancialAid WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Student ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT scholarship_id, student_id, amount FROM Scholarship WHERE amount >= 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, f.amount_available FROM Student s JOIN FundingSource f ON s.student_id = f.source_id WHERE f.amount_available > 10000;
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, fa.amount FROM Student s JOIN FinancialAid fa ON s.student_id = fa.student_id WHERE fa.status = 'Approved' ORDER BY s.last_name, s.first_name;
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, fa.amount FROM Student s LEFT JOIN FinancialAid fa ON s.student_id = fa.student_id AND fa.amount > 0 ORDER BY s.last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_aid;
SELECT student_id, amount, aid_type FROM financial_aid WHERE date_received >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT scholarship_name, amount_awarded, application_deadline FROM scholarships ORDER BY amount_awarded DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM student_info WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_id, fund_type, amount_received, date_received FROM funding_history WHERE amount_received > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_aid WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT student_name, amount_awarded FROM scholarships WHERE amount_awarded >= 1000 ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT fund_type, amount_received FROM funding_history WHERE fund_type='scholarship' AND date_received BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT student_name, gender, payment_type FROM student_info INNER JOIN payment_history ON student_info.student_id = payment_history.student_id WHERE payment_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_aid WHERE aid_type LIKE '%grant%' AND date_received >= '2022-05-01' AND date_received <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount DESC;
